Method Detail

getSASLMechanism

public abstract String getSASLMechanism()
Returns the SASL mechanism for this bind request.

Returns:
The SASL mechanism for this bind request, or null if there are none or if the bind does not use SASL authentication.

SaslException

getName

public DN getName()
Description copied from class: AbstractBindRequest
Returns the distinguished name of the Directory object that the client wishes to bind as. The distinguished name may be empty (but never null) when used for of anonymous binds, or when using SASL authentication. The server shall not dereference any aliases in locating the named object.

Specified by:
getName in interface BindRequest
Specified by:
getName in class AbstractBindRequest<R extends SASLBindRequest<R>>
Returns:
The distinguished name of the Directory object that the client wishes to bind as.

getControls

public final Iterable<Control> getControls()
Returns an Iterable containing the controls included with this request. The returned Iterable may be used to remove controls if permitted by this request.

Specified by:

Returns:
An Iterable containing the controls.
